title: mris_average_curvature
description: This tool averages curvature data across multiple subjects and generates an output curvature file painted onto the last subject specified. It can also generate summary statistics if requested.

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: Specifies the hemisphere (e.g., lh or rh).

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: The list of subjects. The output curvature file will be painted onto the last subject specified.

summary_stats_flag.title: Summary Statistics Flag
summary_stats_flag.description: Generate summary statistics and write them into specified directory.

output_surface_flag.title: Output Surface Flag
output_surface_flag.description: Override the last subject as the output surface.
